action.action-desc: Mr. Nunn of Iowa (for himself and Ms. Crockett) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to reduce the eligibility requirement for direct farm real estate loans, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Next Generation of Farmers Act of 2025.

section.header: Reduction of the eligibility requirement for direct farm real estate loans under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act
section.text: Section 302(b) of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act (7 U.S.C. 1922(b)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking paragraph (1) and inserting the following:

The Secretary may make a direct loan under this subtitle only to a farmer or rancher who has at least 1 year of experience substantially participating in the management and business operations of a farm or ranch, as determined by the Secretary, or has other acceptable education or experience for a period of time, as determined by the Secretary.

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking 3-year requirement in paragraph (1) to 1 or 2 years and inserting 1-year requirement in paragraph (1) to 6 months; and
in subparagraph (B), by striking 3-year and inserting 1-year.
